card_text: 1 "Vanquish Soul" monster$NCannot be used as Link Material. While you control a "Vanquish Soul" monster, your opponent's monsters can only target monsters you control with the highest ATK (their choice, if tied) for attacks. During the Main Phase (Quick Effect): You can activate 1 of these effects;$N●Special Summon 1 "Vanquish Soul" monster from your hand.$N●Add 1 "Vanquish Soul" monster from your GY to your hand.$NYou can only use this effect of "Rock of the Vanquisher" once per turn.
